Name: Henius
Description:
Stetmann is a popular scientist among Raynor's Raider. He acquired the ability to control Zerg neural signals after the experiment in Braxis and Bel'Shir. Stetmann can heal ally unit and use Capsule Monster to fight for him. Also, he can use Capsule Suite to teleport his units.

Can attack the ground and air.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Target the target friendly unit, order the LX-1 Pokemon to heal the target's health and shield value quickly, and provide energy to Stetmann.
Root.Name: Heal

Root.Tooltip: Stetmann will provide healing unit "Nano Shield" once a while, grant it additional shield points and increase its combat ability. Nano Shield will also continuously deal damage to nearby enemy units.
Root.Name: Nano Medic Shield

Root.Tooltip: Deploys a Stetellite at the target location. Stetellites must be placed within a Stetzone.
Root.Name: Deploy Stetellite

Root.Tooltip: Causes 25 damage to an enemy creature unit within 250seconds and causes the same damage to nearby enemy creature units. Friends of mechanical units in the area will receive treatment.
Root.Name: Irradiate

Root.Tooltip: Deals 100 damage to shields and depletes the energy of enemy units in the target area. Cloaked units are revealed for 10 seconds after being hit.
Root.Name: EMP Round

Root.Tooltip: Surrounds a unit with a shield that can absorb up to 60 damage. Effect lasts for 45 seconds.
Root.Name: H.U.G.S. Overload

Root.Tooltip: Allows Stetzones to grant Stetmann's units 100% increased movement speed. Allied units gain 50% increased movement speed.
Root.Name: Switch to F.A.S.T. Configuration

Root.Tooltip: Allows Stetzones to grant Stetmann's units 5.00 Egonergy regeneration per second. Allied units gain 2.50 energy regeneration per second.
Root.Name: Switch to J.U.I.C.E. Configuration

Root.Tooltip: Surrounds the Battlecruiser with a shield that can absorb 200 damage. Ability can only be used once every 20 seconds.
Root.Name: Defensive Matrix

Root.Tooltip: Stetmann will provide healing unit "Nano Shield" once a while, grant it additional shield points and increase its combat ability. Nano Shield will also continuously deal damage to nearby enemy units.
Root.Name: Nano Medic Shield

Root.Tooltip: Like Medivac heal.
Root.Name: Heal

Root.Tooltip: After Stetmann chooses the according Mecha Swarm forces, he will throw a capsule-dropping beacon at targte location. After a short while, his forces will be dropped at target location.
Root.Name: Capsule Monster

Root.Tooltip: Drop a special Nano Capsule at target location. Nano capsule will recognize the signals and contain gather Mecha Swarm. You can redeploy all these units from orbit at target location.
Root.Name: Capsule Suite

Root.Tooltip: Drop beacon at target location, re-deploy Mecha Swarm inside the capsule suite to target location.
Root.Name: Redeploy

Root.Tooltip: Deploy mechanic beacon to target location, sending bots produced from Science Facility to attack target area.
Root.Name: Mech-Rally

Root.Tooltip: Deploy Stetmann's researching facility at target location. Fallen Stetmann's researching facility will deal instant aoe damage and build various kinds of automatic bots to attack enemy units. Stetmann's researching facility lasts for 60 seconds.
Root.Name: Deploy Science Facility

Root.Tooltip: Stetmann takes the medivac and heads to target location.
Root.Name: Faster Redeploy

Root.Tooltip: Stetmann can rapidly regenerate health at any time.
Root.Name: Self-Repair Armor

Root.Tooltip: When Stetmann has a healing effect on an allied target, it generates terrazine, which is stored as its own energy in a form that cannot be consumed by the outside world.
Root.Name: Terrazine Generator

Root.Tooltip: Improve this unit's sight and enable to detect cloaked units.
Root.Name: Explorer Radar

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down two Laser Hydralisk.

Long-range attack unit, can randomly evolve into T-800 or BK201.

T-800: Laser Hydralisk uses a destroying laser. Attacks can cause damage to other units behind the target unit. It can be resurrected after advanced evolution.

BK201: The long-range laser Hydralisk uses an ion laser. Advanced evolution can deal additional damage and use ion annihilation to quickly kill high-threat units.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Deploy Laser Hydralisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down two Laser Hydralisk.

Long-range attack unit, can randomly evolve into T-800 or BK201.

T-800: Laser Hydralisk uses a destroying laser. Attacks can cause damage to other units behind the target unit. It can be resurrected after advanced evolution.

BK201: The long-range laser Hydralisk uses an ion laser. Advanced evolution can deal additional damage and use ion annihilation to quickly kill high-threat units.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Deploy Laser Hydralisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Mecha Devourer.

Ranged Siege Massive Flyer, can randomly evolve into Hydra or Chimz.

Hydra: Mecha Devourer with a compressed quantum cannon, whose attacks are slower but can dump all the fire instantly with an aggregate quantum cannon.

Chimz: Mecha Devourer with a radiation quantum cannon, whose attacks can target air units and cause more damage to hero units.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Mecha Devourer

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Mecha Devourer.

Ranged Siege Massive Flyer, can randomly evolve into Hydra or Chimz.

Hydra: Mecha Devourer with a compressed quantum cannon, whose attacks are slower but can dump all the fire instantly with an aggregate quantum cannon.

Chimz: Mecha Devourer with a radiation quantum cannon, whose attacks can target air units and cause more damage to hero units.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Mecha Devourer

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down two Venolisks at target location.

Rapid melee unit, can randomly evolve into raptor or komodo. Spawn two each time.

Raptor: swift Venolisk, can bound on enemy unit and give a blow, dealing massive amount of damage.

Komodo: Spawn Venolisk contains corrosive acid. Can reduce the attacked unit's armor and make it vulnerable.

Can attack the ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Venolisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down two Venolisks at target location.

Rapid melee unit, can randomly evolve into raptor or komodo. Spawn two each time.

Raptor: swift Venolisk, can bound on enemy unit and give a blow, dealing massive amount of damage.

Komodo: Spawn Venolisk contains corrosive acid. Can reduce the attacked unit's armor and make it vulnerable.

Can attack the ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Venolisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Destroyer.

Ranged Siege unit, can use Thermal Acid. Can randomly evolve into Bel'Cannon or Gun'Charge.

Bel'Cannon: Destroyer with electro-erosive plasma, whose health is slightly reduced, but can use a plasma energy bomb: electro-erosion destroys enemy units at a distance.

Gun'Charger: Destroyer with thermal plasma, who degenerates into a cockroach-like creature due to unknown effects, can use plasma energy bombs: Thermal energy quickly and frequently attacks enemy units.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Destroyer

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Destroyer.

Ranged Siege unit, can use Thermal Acid. Can randomly evolve into Bel'Cannon or Gun'Charge.

Bel'Cannon: Destroyer with electro-erosive plasma, whose health is slightly reduced, but can use a plasma energy bomb: electro-erosion destroys enemy units at a distance.

Gun'Charger: Destroyer with thermal plasma, who degenerates into a cockroach-like creature due to unknown effects, can use plasma energy bombs: Thermal energy quickly and frequently attacks enemy units.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Destroyer

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Burier.

Area control unit, can randomly evolve into Hastur or Nyarlathotep.

Hastur: Burier, who is good at dealing AOE damage, can use ground pulse concussion to cause multiple large-area damage and slow down the movement speed of enemy units when burrowed.

Nyarlathotep: Burier, that is good at causing single-target damage, can simulate Siege Tank for long-range attacks, and can use Tepnya-C Night Roarer to shoot down air units when burrowed.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Burier

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Burier.

Area control unit, can randomly evolve into Hastur or Nyarlathotep.

Hastur: Burier, who is good at dealing AOE damage, can use ground pulse concussion to cause multiple large-area damage and slow down the movement speed of enemy units when burrowed.

Nyarlathotep: Burier, that is good at causing single-target damage, can simulate Siege Tank for long-range attacks, and can use Tepnya-C Night Roarer to shoot down air units when burrowed.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Deploy Burier

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Mecha Ultralisk.

Heavy Ground unit, can randomly evolve into Nidhogg or Bahamut.

Nidhogg: Mecha Ultralisk is good at dealing damage with high-temperature flames. Attacks and skills can ignite enemy ground units in a wide range and continue to burn them.

Bahamut: A mechanical zerg good at using powerful blades and missiles to perform powerful single attack, who has evolved into a beast-like creature due to unknown effects, can use fear collision and reduce the damage.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Depoly Mecha Ultralisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Mecha Ultralisk.

Heavy Ground unit, can randomly evolve into Nidhogg or Bahamut.

Nidhogg: Mecha Ultralisk is good at dealing damage with high-temperature flames. Attacks and skills can ignite enemy ground units in a wide range and continue to burn them.

Bahamut: A mechanical zerg good at using powerful blades and missiles to perform powerful single attack, who has evolved into a beast-like creature due to unknown effects, can use fear collision and reduce the damage.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Depoly Mecha Ultralisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Laser Mutalisk.

Flying creature, can randomly evolve into Nirvash or Macross.

Nirvash: Laser Mutalisk that deals range damage with Laser Rotary Blade, whose attacks can eject multiple units and make it easier to dodge damage.

Macross: Laser Mutalisk using the laser ball to hit the single unit, can use T-Eye triangle rays to deal a lot of damage and have higher ability after escaping from the battle.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Deploy Laser Mutalisk

0002.Tooltip:
Deploy a beacon to the target location and call down one Laser Mutalisk.

Flying creature, can randomly evolve into Nirvash or Macross.

Nirvash: Laser Mutalisk that deals range damage with Laser Rotary Blade, whose attacks can eject multiple units and make it easier to dodge damage.

Macross: Laser Mutalisk using the laser ball to hit the single unit, can use T-Eye triangle rays to deal a lot of damage and have higher ability after escaping from the battle.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Deploy Laser Mutalisk
